name: Tails from the Galaxy: Grounded
description:
TCS 191 final project made with Twine (Sugarcube 2).

“Tails from the Galaxy” is a sci-fi universe illustrating humanoid animals exploring a vast cyberpunk world. Follow the origin story of aspiring - and broke as hell - space adventurer Robin Steele as they dream of beautiful skies to traverse. Learn about the vast Whirlpool Galaxy, venture through the seedy downtown of Aurora, and punch an annoying wolfboy bully in the face!
